subject: Verify your Facebook account security
description_text:
Facebook Account Verification to Protect Your Information
Dear service@simsonn.com,
We've noticed some unusual activity on your account. To ensure its security and compliance with our guidelines, please verify your identity. This step helps safeguard your account from unauthorized access and maintains a safe experience for our community. Follow the instructions to complete the verification process. Thank you!

Verification Instructions:

Access the secure verification link: Start Account Verification
Choose a verification method (e.g., government-issued ID or phone number).
Complete the process within 48 hours to avoid account restrictions.
Please do not reply directly to this email. For assistance, contact us at support@facebook.com. We are committed to keeping your information secure.
Sincerely,Facebook Security Team


This email was sent to service@simsonn.com.Â© 2025 Meta. Meta Platforms, Inc., 1601 Willow Rd. Menlo Park, CA 94025Learn More | Unsubscribe
